tasks.task: Convert pallets into a composter with bins using wire.
subtasks: Acquire pallets from a building supplier.
Arrange pallets (one at each end and two in the middle) to form three bins.
Use bailing wire to secure the pallet bins.
Loop wire through the pallet holes, twist, and tightens with pliers or nippers.
Trim and flatten loose wire ends.
Repeat the wire securing process for the top and bottom of the pallet bins.
